original_text: So he stayed there that night, and from what he had with him he took a present for his brother Esau,
korean_text: 야곱이 거기서 밤을 지내고 그 소유 중에서 형 에서를 위하여 예물을 택하니

sentences.original_text: So he stayed there that night
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그날 밤 그곳에 머물렀다

sentences.original_text: and from what he had with him
he took a present for his brother Esau
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 형 에서를 위한 선물을 챙겼다
